text: Item Description Tuition The cost of taking a course varies from school to school. To search for tuition costs at different colleges, go to www.studentaid.ed.gov/myfsa Room and board The cost of lodging and food varies from school to school. Go to www.studentaid.ed.gov/myfsa to search for estimated costs. Books and school supplies Books can be expensive. School supplies can indude book bags, notebooks, pens, pendls. paper, folders, stapler, desk organizing system (trays, pen holder, etc.), computer paper, etc. According to the College Board, the national average cost for textbooks at four-year public colleges in 2009-10 was S1.122. Fees Fees will depend on the school you’re attending. This list can be obtained directly from the school. Fees indude activity fees, parking decal fees, etc. Equipment and room materials Equipment may indude a computer, printer, etc. Furnishings or room materials may include such items as reading lamps, microwave, refrigerator, sheets, towels, etc. Travel and miscellaneous expenses If you live on campus, you’ll probably need to travel during school breaks. Other expenses can indude clothing and cell phone use.
